title: Citibank FACT AwardsTM Announce 2011 Winners for Bahrain's Leisure Industry
summary: Manama - The winners of Bahrain's Favorite restaurants, cafes, lounges and pubs were announced during a sophisticated and glamorous Citibank FACT AwardsTM ceremony at Cafe Italia Restaurant, winner of 2010 Favorite Restaurant category, on Tuesday, December 6, 2011.
tag-1: Citibank FACT AwardsTM Announce 2011 Winners for Bahrain's Leisure Industry
tag-2: Manama – The winners of Bahrain's Favorite restaurants, cafes, lounges and pubs were announced during a sophisticated and glamorous Citibank FACT AwardsTM ceremony at Cafe Italia Restaurant, winner of 2010 Favorite Restaurant category, on Tuesday, December 6, 2011.
tag-3: Citibank, N. A. and FACT Magazine have again joined forces this year to bring Bahrain the only nationwide leisure-industry awards campaign that is voted by the Bahrain public, which awards their favorite venues in the country. New to this year's campaign are the "Favorite North American," "Favorite Latin American," "Favorite Arabic" and "Favorite Newcomer" categories.
tag-4: The 2011 FACT AwardsTM attracted more than 20,000 votes, through the voting forms that were distributed in all nominated restaurants. Voting for 2011's campaign ran from October 8 – November 20.
tag-5: Tony Sidgwick, Editor-in-Chief of FACT Magazine, said: "It's with great pleasure that we announce the winners of the 2011 Citibank FACT Awards campaign. With new categories, new entrants, new winners and more than 20,000 votes, this has been our most successful campaign to date. The FACT Awards were created to constantly raise the standards of the already excellent dining and leisure scene in Bahrain by recognizing excellence in the industry – and what better way than to put it to public vote?"
tag-6: The country's top restaurateurs attended the event alongside Navneet Kampani, Head of Consumer Banking, and other Citibank representatives. Mr. Kampani personally presented the award for Bahrain's Favorite Restaurant 2011.
tag-7: "We are extremely proud to present this year's winners with their Citibank FACT Awards for the second time. We continue to seek ways to partner with publications like FACT magazine so as to develop innovative programs that bring value to our customers by offering them exclusive benefits and privileges on their Citibank Credit Cards," commented Mr. Kampani.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
